page.title: 16INDUSTRY & TRADE IN DUDLEY 3
page.content: Another recent trend has been the increase in the number of{covered {shopping arcades}like Churchill Precinct and Trident Centre.Two{indoor {markets}have also opened. The traditional British{snack bar}and {fish & chip shop}have been joined by { {Asian restaurants}and{American style {fast food shops.}Also appearing among the shops are several{amusement {arcades}with their computerised gaming machines. The town centre is a{pedestrian area and on Saturdays the whole High Street is closed to traffic.Unlike nearby towns,Dudley provides{free car parking for shoppers,with almost 3000 parking spaces around the town,principally in two large car parks.
